item.title: [Python] Try to simulate the movement of the solar system
item.description: This is a New Year advent calendar sent by "[Riemannsat Project](https://www.rymansat.com)",anorganizationthatconductsspacedevelopmentasahobby.Youcanseethesummaryarticlefrom[here](https://qiita.com/rsp-dgkz/items/497225739b88c817a90c). ##who are you? I am working as an attitude control system in the 10 cm cubic microsatellite rsp-01 development team aiming at self-shooting missions with arms deployed. I usually do rocket engine numerical calculations at university. Introduction Since articles that deal with ISS orbitandsatelliteattitude have popped up, In this article, I would like to aim at displaying the motions of solar system planets farther away.
